mapper.select: SELECT U.ID As ID, U.USERNAME as USERNAME, U.PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, U.USERTYPE AS USERTYPE, U.CREATEDDATE AS CREATEDDATE, U.MODIFIEDDATE AS MODIFIEDDATE, U.STATUS AS STATUS, U.CREATEDBY AS CREATEDBY, U.MODIFIEDBY AS MODIFIEDBY FROM USERINFO U WHERE U.STATUS = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERINFO WHERE STATUS = '1'
